original_text: But found none: yea, though many false witnesses came, yet found they none. At the last came two false witnesses,
korean_text: 거짓 증인이 많이 왔으나 얻지 못하더니 후에 두 사람이 와서

sentences.original_text: yea, though many false witnesses came
sentences.korean_translation: 그래, 비록 많은 거짓 증인들이 왔지만

sentences.original_text: At the last came two false witnesses
